04. Building the Structure

  • Getting Started

    Let's get started with the development.
    But first, let's comment on the script to disable our WebGL application.

    // const gl_app = new GLApp() (main.js)
// canvas#sketch { display: none; } (style.css)

  • The Page Structure

    Following is our page structure to receive the UI content.

    body
    a.logo
    
    div.content
        div.content__holder.holder

            a.cta

            div.bg
                div.bg__grad


            div.marquees
                ul.marquees__holder.holder
                    li.marquees__travel.mq (* 4)
                        li.marquees__content {{ content }} (* 8)


            div.texts
                ul.texts__holder.holder
                    li (* 4)
                        h2 {{ content }}
                        p {{ content }}


            div.trgs
                div.trgs__holder.holder
                    button.trgs__trg.prev 
                        svg
                    button.trgs__trg.next 
                        svg

  • The <body> elements

    Those are the root elements inside of our body tag:

    index.html
    <body>
	<a href="#" class="logo"><svg></svg></a>

	<div class="content">
		<div class="content__holder holder">
            <!-- the website's content goes here -->
            <!-- the website's content goes here -->
        </div>
	</div>

	<canvas id="sketch"></canvas>
	<script type="module" src="/main.js"></script>
</body>

  • Content's elements

    Those are the elements inside of the content div:

  • CTA

    <a href="#" class="cta"></a>

    index.html
    <div class="content">
    <div class="content__holder holder">

        <a href="#" class="cta">
            <span> Keep in touch</span>
        </a>

        ...
    </div>
</div>

  • Background

    <div class="bg"></div>

    index.html
    <div class="content">
    <div class="content__holder holder">
        ...

        <div class="bg">
            <div class="bg__grad"></div>
        </div>

        ...
    </div>
</div>

  • Marquee

    <div class="marquees"></div>

    index.html
    <div class="content">
    <div class="content__holder holder">
        ...

        <div class="marquees">
            <ul class="marquees__holder holder">
                <li class="marquees__travel mq">
                    <span class="marquees__content">E-commerce</span>
                    <span class="marquees__content">E-commerce</span>
                    <span class="marquees__content">E-commerce</span>
                    <span class="marquees__content">E-commerce</span>
                    <span class="marquees__content">E-commerce</span>
                    <span class="marquees__content">E-commerce</span>
                    <span class="marquees__content">E-commerce</span>
                    <span class="marquees__content">E-commerce</span>
                </li>
                <li class="marquees__travel mq">
                    <span class="marquees__content">StoryTelling</span>
                    <span class="marquees__content">StoryTelling</span>
                    <span class="marquees__content">StoryTelling</span>
                    <span class="marquees__content">StoryTelling</span>
                    <span class="marquees__content">StoryTelling</span>
                    <span class="marquees__content">StoryTelling</span>
                    <span class="marquees__content">StoryTelling</span>
                    <span class="marquees__content">StoryTelling</span>
                </li>

                <li class="marquees__travel mq">
                    <span class="marquees__content">Showcase</span>
                    <span class="marquees__content">Showcase</span>
                    <span class="marquees__content">Showcase</span>
                    <span class="marquees__content">Showcase</span>
                    <span class="marquees__content">Showcase</span>
                    <span class="marquees__content">Showcase</span>
                    <span class="marquees__content">Showcase</span>
                    <span class="marquees__content">Showcase</span>
                </li>
                <li class="marquees__travel mq">
                    <span class="marquees__content">Corporative</span>
                    <span class="marquees__content">Corporative</span>
                    <span class="marquees__content">Corporative</span>
                    <span class="marquees__content">Corporative</span>
                    <span class="marquees__content">Corporative</span>
                    <span class="marquees__content">Corporative</span>
                    <span class="marquees__content">Corporative</span>
                    <span class="marquees__content">Corporative</span>
                </li>
            </ul>
        </div>

        ...
    </div>
</div>

  • Texts

    <div class="texts"></div>

    index.html
    <div class="content">
    <div class="content__holder holder">
        ...

        <div class="texts">
            <ul class="texts__holder holder">
                <li class="texts__txt">
                    <h2>E-commerce</h2>
                    <p>...</p>
                </li>
                <li class="texts__txt">
                    <h2>StoryTelling</h2>
                    <p>...</p>
                </li>						
                <li class="texts__txt">
                    <h2>Showcase</h2>
                    <p>...</p>
                </li>					
                <li class="texts__txt">
                    <h2>Corporative</h2>
                    <p>...</p>
                </li>
            </ul>
        </div>

        ...
    </div>
</div>

  • Triggers

    <div class="trgs"></div>

    index.html
    <div class="content">
    <div class="content__holder holder">
        ...

        <div class="trgs">
            <div class="trgs__holder holder">
                <button class="trgs__trg prev">
                    <svg></svg>
                </button>

                <button class="trgs__trg next">
                    <svg></svg>
                </button>
            </div>
        </div>

        ...
    </div>
</div>
